Hi all, how are you doing? I am a new member in the group, and I have
been using the Heritrix software for some time now. 

I have a question:

Assuming that I have a list of seeds (eg.100 seeds), and I want to
download the pages that are 1 level after these seeds, and not the
actuals seeds. Is there any specific comination of Link hops and or
Trans hops I need to follow?

As I am not interested in having an extra 100 pages (the seeds) that
are  causing a problem to the quality of the actual download, I want
to use them as a mere start point from which the Heritrix, should
download the pages that come from the links within each seed.

Thank you in advance

:)
